transactionSet.name: Purchase Order
transactionSet.description: This Draft Standard for Trial Use contains the format and establishes the data contents of the Purchase Order Transaction Set (850) for use within the context of an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) environment. The transaction set can be used to provide for customary and established business and industry practice relative to the placement of purchase orders for goods and services. This transaction set should not be used to convey purchase order changes or purchase order acknowledgment information.

segment.name: Transaction Set Header
segment.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

segment.name: Beginning Segment for Purchase Order
segment.description: To indicate the beginning of the Purchase Order Transaction Set and transmit identifying numbers and dates

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

dataElement.name: Purchase Order Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of Purchase Order

dataElement.name: Purchase Order Number
dataElement.description: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

dataElement.name: Release Number
dataElement.description: Number identifying a release against a Purchase Order previously placed by the parties involved in the transaction

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Contract Number
dataElement.description: Contract number

dataElement.name: Acknowledgment Type
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of acknowledgment

dataElement.name: Invoice Type Code
dataElement.description: Code defining the method by which invoices are to be processed

dataElement.name: Contract Type Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a contract type

dataElement.name: Purchase Category
dataElement.description: Code identifying the broad category of products or services being acquired

dataElement.name: Security Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

dataElement.name: Transaction Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of transaction

segment.name: Note/Special Instruction
segment.description: To transmit information in a free-form format, if necessary, for comment or special instruction

dataElement.name: Note Reference Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the functional area or purpose for which the note applies

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

segment.name: Reference Identification
segment.description: To specify identifying information

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

segment.name: Sales Requirements
segment.description: To specify general conditions or requirements of the sale

dataElement.name: Sales Requirement Code
dataElement.description: Code to identify a specific requirement or agreement of sale

dataElement.name: Action Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating type of action

dataElement.name: Amount
dataElement.description: Monetary amount

dataElement.name: Account Number
dataElement.description: Account number assigned

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Special Services Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the special service

dataElement.name: Product/Service Substitution Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating product or service substitution conditions

dataElement.name: Percent
dataElement.description: Percentage expressed as a decimal

dataElement.name: Percent Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code to qualify percent

segment.name: Terms of Sale/Deferred Terms of Sale
segment.description: To specify terms of sale

dataElement.name: Terms Type Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of payment terms

dataElement.name: Terms Basis Date Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the beginning of the terms period

dataElement.name: Terms Discount Percent
dataElement.description: Terms discount percentage, expressed as a percent, available to the purchaser if an invoice is paid on or before the Terms Discount Due Date

dataElement.name: Terms Discount Due Date
dataElement.description: Date payment is due if discount is to be earned expressed in format CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Terms Discount Days Due
dataElement.description: Number of days in the terms discount period by which payment is due if terms discount is earned

dataElement.name: Terms Net Due Date
dataElement.description: Date when total invoice amount becomes due expressed in format CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Terms Net Days
dataElement.description: Number of days until total invoice amount is due (discount not applicable)

dataElement.name: Terms Discount Amount
dataElement.description: Total amount of terms discount

dataElement.name: Terms Deferred Due Date
dataElement.description: Date deferred payment or percent of invoice payable is due expressed in format CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Deferred Amount Due
dataElement.description: Deferred amount due for payment

dataElement.name: Percent of Invoice Payable
dataElement.description: Amount of invoice payable expressed in percent

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Day of Month
dataElement.description: The numeric value of the day of the month between 1 and the maximum day of the month being referenced

dataElement.name: Payment Method Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of payment procedures

dataElement.name: Percent
dataElement.description: Percentage expressed as a decimal

segment.name: Date/Time Reference
segment.description: To specify pertinent dates and times

dataElement.name: Date/Time Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

segment.name: Carrier Details (Routing Sequence/Transit Time)
segment.description: To specify the carrier and sequence of routing and provide transit time information

dataElement.name: Routing Sequence Code
dataElement.description: Code describing the relationship of a carrier to a specific shipment movement

dataElement.name: Identification Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

dataElement.name: Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a party or other code

dataElement.name: Transportation Method/Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

dataElement.name: Routing
dataElement.description: Free-form description of the routing or requested routing for shipment, or the originating carrier's identity

segment.name: Identification Reference
segment.description: To transmit identifying information as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Free-form Description
dataElement.description: Free-form descriptive text

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

segment.name: Text
segment.description: To specify textual data

dataElement.name: Note Reference Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the functional area or purpose for which the note applies

dataElement.name: Message Text
dataElement.description: To transmit large volumes of message text

dataElement.name: Message Text
dataElement.description: To transmit large volumes of message text

dataElement.name: Printer Carriage Control Code
dataElement.description: A field to be used for the control of the line feed of the receiving printer

segment.name: Name
segment.description: To identify a party by type of organization, name, and code

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

dataElement.description: Free-form name

dataElement.name: Identification Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

dataElement.name: Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a party or other code

dataElement.name: Entity Relationship Code
dataElement.description: Code describing entity relationship

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

segment.name: Additional Name Information
segment.description: To specify additional names or those longer than 35 characters in length

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

segment.description: To specify the location of the named party

dataElement.name: Address Information
dataElement.description: Address information

dataElement.name: Address Information
dataElement.description: Address information

dataElement.name: Postal Code

dataElement.description: Code identifying the country

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Location Identifier
dataElement.description: Code which identifies a specific location

segment.name: Location ID Component
segment.description: To define types and values of a geographic location

dataElement.name: Address Component Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the type of address component

dataElement.name: Address Information
dataElement.description: Address information

dataElement.name: County Designator
dataElement.description: Code identifying the county within a state

segment.name: F.O.B. Related Instructions
segment.description: To specify transportation instructions relating to shipment

dataElement.name: Shipment Method of Payment
dataElement.description: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Transportation Terms Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the source of the transportation terms

dataElement.name: Transportation Terms Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the trade terms which apply to the shipment transportation responsibility

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Risk of Loss Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying where responsibility for risk of loss passes

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

segment.name: Carrier Details (Quantity and Weight)
segment.description: To specify the transportation details relative to commodity, weight, and quantity

dataElement.name: Packaging Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

dataElement.name: Lading Quantity
dataElement.description: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

dataElement.name: Commodity Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

dataElement.name: Commodity Code
dataElement.description: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

dataElement.name: Lading Description
dataElement.description: Description of an item as required for rating and billing purposes

dataElement.name: Weight Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code defining the type of weight

dataElement.name: Weight
dataElement.description: Numeric value of weight

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Volume
dataElement.description: Value of volumetric measure

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

segment.name: Carrier Details (Routing Sequence/Transit Time)
segment.description: To specify the carrier and sequence of routing and provide transit time information

dataElement.name: Routing Sequence Code
dataElement.description: Code describing the relationship of a carrier to a specific shipment movement

dataElement.name: Identification Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

dataElement.name: Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a party or other code

dataElement.name: Transportation Method/Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

dataElement.name: Routing
dataElement.description: Free-form description of the routing or requested routing for shipment, or the originating carrier's identity

dataElement.name: Shipment/Order Status Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the status of an order or shipment or the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity shipped for a line item or transaction

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Location Identifier
dataElement.description: Code which identifies a specific location

dataElement.name: Transit Direction Code
dataElement.description: The point of origin and point of direction

dataElement.name: Transit Time Direction Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code specifying the value of time used to measure the transit time

dataElement.name: Transit Time
dataElement.description: The numeric amount of transit time

dataElement.name: Service Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

dataElement.name: Service Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

dataElement.name: Service Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

dataElement.name: Country Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the country

segment.name: Carrier Details (Equipment)
segment.description: To specify transportation details relating to the equipment used by the carrier

dataElement.name: Equipment Description Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

dataElement.name: Equipment Initial
dataElement.description: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

dataElement.name: Equipment Number
dataElement.description: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

dataElement.name: Weight Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code defining the type of weight

dataElement.name: Weight
dataElement.description: Numeric value of weight

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Ownership Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the relationship of equipment to carrier or ownership of equipment

dataElement.name: Seal Status Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating condition of door seal upon arrival

dataElement.name: Seal Number
dataElement.description: Unique number on seal used to close a shipment

dataElement.name: Equipment Type
dataElement.description: Code identifying equipment type

segment.name: Carrier Details (Special Handling, or Hazardous Materials, or Both)
segment.description: To specify transportation special handling requirements, or hazardous materials information, or both

dataElement.name: Special Handling Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying special transportation handling instructions

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code which qualifies the Hazardous Material Class Code (209)

dataElement.name: Hazardous Material Class Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the kind of hazard for a material

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

segment.name: Marking, Packaging, Loading
segment.description: To describe marking, packaging, loading, and unloading requirements

dataElement.name: Item Description Type
dataElement.description: Code indicating the format of a description

dataElement.name: Packaging Characteristic Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the marking, packaging, loading and related characteristics being described

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Packaging Description Code
dataElement.description: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about the marking, packaging or loading and unloading of a product

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Unit Load Option Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying loading or unloading a shipment

segment.name: Baseline Item Data
segment.description: To specify basic and most frequently used line item data

dataElement.name: Assigned Identification
dataElement.description: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

dataElement.name: Quantity Ordered
dataElement.description: Quantity ordered

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

dataElement.name: Unit Price
dataElement.description: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

dataElement.name: Basis of Unit Price Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of unit price for an item

dataElement.name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

dataElement.name: Product/Service ID
dataElement.description: Identifying number for a product or service

segment.name: Product/Item Description
segment.description: To describe a product or process in coded or free-form format

dataElement.name: Item Description Type
dataElement.description: Code indicating the format of a description

dataElement.name: Product/Process Characteristic Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the general class of a product or process characteristic

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Product Description Code
dataElement.description: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about a product characteristic

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

segment.name: Item Physical Details
segment.description: To specify the physical qualities, packaging, weights, and dimensions relating to the item

dataElement.name: Pack
dataElement.description: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

dataElement.name: Size
dataElement.description: Size of supplier units in pack

dataElement.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

segment.name: Transaction Totals
segment.description: To transmit a hash total for a specific element in the transaction set

dataElement.name: Number of Line Items
dataElement.description: Total number of line items in the transaction set

segment.name: Transaction Set Trailer
segment.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

dataElement.name: Number of Included Segments
dataElement.description: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set
